quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First step, retrieve the American limited edition passkey from the floor of the workshop. And then, assure that the American limited edition box is unlocked with the American limited edition passkey. And then, look and see that the American limited edition box is wide open. Then, pick up the passkey from the American limited edition box in the workshop. After taking the passkey, make an attempt to go west. With that over with, check that the locker is unlocked with the passkey. After that, ensure that the locker is open. And then, retrieve the non-euclidean key from the locker. If you can get your hands on the non-euclidean key, venture east. Then, unlock the non-euclidean box. And once you've done that, you win!
commands: unlock American limited edition box with American limited edition passkey
take passkey from American limited edition box
unlock non-euclidean box with non-euclidean key
unlock American limited edition box with American limited edition passkey
take passkey from American limited edition box
unlock non-euclidean box with non-euclidean key

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a workshop. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You see a non-euclidean box.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The non-euclidean box contains [a list of things in the c_0]. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] American limited edition box right there by you.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The American limited edition box contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The American limited edition box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see a chair. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best? The chair is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_0] On the chair you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the chair! oh well.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a playroom. An usual one.

 Look over there! a locker. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the bathroom.

 You can see a safe.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You make out a rack. [if there is something on the s_1]On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_1]. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've entered a sauna.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a launderette. An usual kind of place.

 You make out a trunk.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The trunk is empty, what a horrible day![end if] Look over there! a shelf. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the shelf.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a shower. A typical one.

 You scan the room, seeing a box.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The box contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a counter. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a restroom. A normal kind of place.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You arrive in a garage. A normal kind of place. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.

 You see a table. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the table. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But there isn't a thing on it. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if] You see a workbench. You wonder idly who left that here. The workbench is splintery.[if there is something on the s_5] On the splintery workbench you can see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the workbench.[end if] You make out a rough workbench. [if there is something on the s_6]On the rough workbench you make out [a list of things on the s_6]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the chamber.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the cellar.



 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bedroom. An ordinary kind of place.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a laundromat. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You are in a steam room. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can see a board. The board is typical.[if there is something on the s_7] On the board you make out [a list of things on the s_7]. Wow! Just like in the movies![end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] However, the board, like an empty board, has nothing on it. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the lounge. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You see [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] type 9 safe close by.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The type 9 safe contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The type 9 safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the salon.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a washroom. An usual kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can make out a formless locker. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The formless locker contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a bench. You shudder, but continue examining the bench. [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You've entered an attic. The room is well lit.

 You can see a table. The table is rusty.[if there is something on the s_9] On the rusty table you see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You've entered a standard room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be standard. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the laundry place. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.



There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
Look around you. Take it all in. It's not every day someone gets to be in a vault.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a cuboid safe.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The cuboid safe contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The cuboid safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You can see a workbench. [if there is something on the s_10]On the workbench you can make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You make out a stand. [if there is something on the s_11]On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_11]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You are in a bar. An ordinary one.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

walkthrough: unlock American limited edition box with American limited edition passkey
take passkey from American limited edition box
unlock non-euclidean box with non-euclidean key

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First stop, retrieve the American limited edition passkey from the floor of the workshop. And then, make absolutely sure that the American limited edition box within the workshop is unlocked. And then, make absolutely sure that the American limited edition box is wide open. After that, pick up the passkey from the American limited edition box in the workshop. After that, travel west. And then, look and see that the locker is unlocked with the passkey. Once you have unlocked the locker, open the locker within the playroom. Then, retrieve the non-euclidean key from the locker in the playroom. Having got the non-euclidean key, venture east. Okay, and then, assure that the non-euclidean box is unlocked with the non-euclidean key. That's it!
